name: ECOGPerformanceStatus
title: ECOG Performance Status
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) tool to assess performance status.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with ECOG tool for performance status assessment.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group scale for physical assessment (assessment scale)
